changeSet.sql: -- Add/modify columns alter table APPS.CALC_DISTRIBUTION_LINES add from_header_id number; -- Add comments to the columns comment on column APPS.CALC_DISTRIBUTION_LINES.from_header_id is 'Идентификатор заголовка распределения, из которого скопирована строка'; -- Create/Recreate primary, unique and foreign key constraints alter table APPS.CALC_DISTRIBUTION_LINES add constraint FK_CALC_DISTRIBUTION_LINES_11 foreign key (FROM_HEADER_ID) references APPS.calc_distribution_headers (ID) deferrable initially deferred;-- Add/modify columns alter table APPS.CALC_DISTRIBUTION_HEADERS add note varchar2(500); -- Add comments to the columns comment on column APPS.CALC_DISTRIBUTION_HEADERS.note is 'Комментарий';
